title: Closer
description: Alternate covers for this ASIN can be found here and hereDanger. Intrigue. Suspense. Michael Cartwright possesses them all. A Green Beret fresh out of the military, Michael is haunted by the tours he served in Afghanistan and Iraq. When he is sent on assignment to protect his country, he gets more than he bargained for . . .Emma Welby is an intellectually driven beauty. She challenges Michael in a way that no one ever has. Her top secret work for the Department of Defense threatens her very existence. With danger lurking around every corner, can Michael keep his demons from destroying his future and still save Emma, or will they consume him?+18 warning â€“ This book is intended for mature audiences.
author: Sarah Greyson
